definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: David was in the stronghold while the Philistine garrison was at Bethlehem.
sentences.chinese: 達味恰在山砦內，而培肋舍特人當時在白冷駐防。

sentences.english: I love the feeling of sailing on the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我喜緩洗砦筅湖上航行的感受。

sentences.english: And meanwhile, they fortified the place and stationed army there to strengthen their military control.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時還設置砦堡和駐守義軍土兵，加強軍事控制。

sentences.english: And David was then in a hold. and there was a garrison of the Philistines then in Bethlehem.
sentences.chinese: 達味恰在山砦內，而培肋舍特人當時在白冷駐防。

definition: Beiguan district of Anyang city 安陽市|安阳市[An1 yang2 shi4], Henan
name of a mountain in Henan/also pr. [Yao2]
Fangcheng county in Nanyang 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan
square castle/mahjong layout (with the tiles laid out as a square)
earth embankment used to hold back or retain water/dike around a paddy field
Wucheng county in Dezhou 德州[De2 zhou1], Shandong
prisoner of war/to capture/to take prisoner/(old) northern barbarian/slave
abbr. for 峴首山|岘首山[Xian4 shou3 shan1]/Mt Xianshou in Hubei/steep hill/used in place names
